'Dead Letter Circus' are an alternative rock band from Brisbane, Queensland,
Australia. Their debut album [[This Is the Warning]] debuted at No. 2 on
the Australian album charts and spawned a number of singles that were played
heavily on radio, http://hangout.altsounds.com/news/130664-dead-
letter-circus-announce-uk-tour-dates.html and have become one of the more
popular bands in Australian rock.
